posts.name: May
posts.cooked:
Hi all,

I am trying to program the robot with Python, and encountered some problems when following the setting up the robotpy. Any helps or suggestions are appreciated.

Basically, I am following the steps on robotpy doc ( Commands install — RobotPy 2023 documentation ) to do the set up things, and when i was going through this step -【Setup（RobotRIO）】 image 1022×524 24.6 KB

image 1022×524 24.6 KB

image 1022×524 24.6 KB

it reported errors: No such option: -U image 1040×347 11.4 KB

image 1040×347 11.4 KB

image 1040×347 11.4 KB

Any ideas on how could i fix it?   Many Thanks!!!

posts.name: Davo
posts.cooked:
I’m surprised people are only noticing this typo in the docs now.

-U isn’t a valid option for the download command. I think this might be left over after copy-pasting from previous years.

It should be removed from the download command on all the install pages. Contributions welcome, if we don’t get around to it beforehand. (I won’t be at a computer until tomorrow morning Sydney time.)
